posts.body:
>>8e6a113e-c7a1-4911-9a8f-60cb8412519b
I will tell you, it is literally just the fact that people who commit mass shootings rarely have the presence of mind to consider what they're doing on a higher strategic level than "body density good". There is no way in hell that they would think to ask others how to do it right, and do have the presence of mind for it, they won't need to because they'll be sane enough to pick a good target and plan for their own situation without other people's help.
